attributes.action: suspend council tax in areas without elections
attributes.additional_details: because we have had elections suspended for too long and two years without representation is undemocratic
attributes.background: suspend the collection or set dates for elections within  this year as the mandate for the current post holders hs expired along with their mandate to collect

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Suspend Council Tax collection in areas with delays to Local Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755322
